alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Linn; Macon; Randolph (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 1:25AM CDT until August 02 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Randolph County in north central Missouri... Northeastern Chariton County in north central Missouri... Linn County in north central Missouri... Macon County in north central Missouri... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 124 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bucklin, or near Brookfield, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Macon, Brookfield, Marceline, Bevier, Bucklin, Laclede, Callao, Linneus, Browning, New Cambria, Purdin, Jacksonville, Ethel, New Boston, Excello, Wien and Saint Catherine. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
